name: SWEÆT SHOP
description:
Use the mouse to click, and make candy!

This is a clicker game, you have been warned.

In this super happy, not at all evil candy factory, you can click a button to make candy.  Or you can hire child laborers and overseers, then give them incentives and quotas.  Up to you.

This is a simple clicker, but there is a final score.  The final score may not be what you expect.
